description: Discover the best hotels in Ras Al Khaimah, United Arab Emirates. Find exclusive deals and luxury accommodations.

hotels.title: Five Star Dubai Beachfront Al Marjan Island Haven with Dining, Pools & Spa
hotels.description: Discover the epitome of luxury at this stylish five-star Al Marjan Island resort, positioned on the pristine shores of the Arabian Gulf. Indulge in water sports, relax in the serene spa, or take a refreshing dip in the expansive swimming pools. Savour a culinary journey at one of the hotels six specialty restaurants and bars. Families will love the Kids Club, Teen Zone and mini golf. Venture beyond the hotel to explore the enchanting Al Marjan Island, a man-made archipelago renowned for its stunning beaches and vibrant nightlife. The hotel is within easy reach of the Al Hamra Mall, offering an array of high-end retail and dining options. Experience the perfect blend of relaxation and adventure.

hotels.vendor_name: InterContinental Ras Al Khaimah Resort and Spa
hotels.title: United Arab Emirates Beachfront Luxury with Six Onsite Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Desert luxury and beachfront bliss come together at InterContinental Ras Al Khaimah Resort and Spa, an IHG Hotel, set on a stretch of pristine sand just an hour from Dubai. This opulent resort features incredible facilities including a private beach, two sparkling swimming pools flanked by cabanas and sun loungers, and a decadent spa offering a hammam experience and traditional rituals like grain massage. When it comes to wining and dining, you'll be spoilt for choice with six restaurants and bars onsite.

hotels.title: Quintessential Pullman Luxury on Al Marjan Island with Private Beach & Seven Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Nestled on Ras Al Khaimah’s first man-made island, this Pullman edifice is a five-star sanctuary where luxury meets Arabian heritage. Overlooking the shimmering Arabian Gulf, this exquisite retreat offers an unparalleled blend of elegance, adventure, and tranquility. Indulge in the serene La`mar Spa, unwind on the private beach, or take a dip in the indoor and outdoor pools. For thrill-seekers, exhilarating water sports, dune bashing, and camel rides await, while history lovers can explore Ras Al Khaimah’s rich cultural heritage. Just an hour from Dubai, this exclusive resort-the only one with two waterfronts-invites you to experience the UAE beyond its skyscrapers, embracing its traditions, landscapes, and warm hospitality.

hotels.title: United Arab Emirates Beachfront Luxury with Seven Onsite Restaurants & Bars & Four Pools
hotels.description: Desert luxury and beachfront bliss come together at Sofitel Al Hamra Beach Resort set on a stretch of pristine sand just an hour from Dubai. This opulent retreat boasts a private white-sand beach, a tranquil spa and a selection of fine dining options - including four restaurants and three bars. Venture out to explore the nearby Al Hamra Mall, brimming with high-end boutiques and international brands, or take a short drive to the Dhayah Fort, offering panoramic views of the surrounding mountains and azure waters. After a day of exploration, retreat to one of the hotel's sun-soaked pools or relax at the tranquil Sofitel SPA with Clarins.

hotels.title: United Arab Emirates Five-Star Al Marjan Island Escape with 12 Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Uncover a blend of Arabian hospitality and modern elegance at this five-star sanctuary, perfectly situated on the pristine beaches of Ras Al Khaimah. Soak up the panoramic city and ocean views, lounge by the sparkling pool and rejuvenate with treatments at the spa. With endless activities and a vast array of restaurants and bars to choose from, this is the perfect escape for a fun-filled and relaxing holiday. When hunger strikes, tuck into a myriad of dining options, from the Turkish delights of Lalezar to the seafood specialties at Fishbone Restaurant. This captivating destination offers a perfect blend of stunning natural landscapes, rich cultural heritage, and thrilling adventures. An hour from Dubai and it's vibrant landmarks, this elegant resort is perfect for an unforgettable adventure.
